properties.body:
EASTERN CARIBBEAN SEA.
SAINT MARTIN TO SAINT LUCIA.
DNC 14, DNC 16.
30 FOOT S/V NIHUIM, WHITE HULL, ONE PERSON ON BOARD,
OVERDUE ST MARTIN (18-04N 063-03W) TO
ST LUCIA (13-53N 060-58W).  LAST KNOWN POSITION
IN VICINITY GUADELOUPE WITH ENGINE TROUBLE ON
02 SEP. VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A
SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO MRCC FORT DE FRANCE,
INMARSAT-C: 422799024,
TELEX: 42912008,
PHONE: 5965 9670 9292,
FAX: 5965 9663 2450,
E-MAIL: ANTILLES@MRCCFR.EU.
